reviewText: This is a good movie about Pearl Harbor and what happened there. It has a good cast and keeps you interested the whole time. Would recommend.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series

reviewText: This is a wonderful telling of the raid on Pearl Harbor.  I have been trying to find it for ages.  I would recommend this to anyone who likes history with a good story.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series

reviewText: I love this Mini Series.  Great stars and a different perspective of that horrible day in December.  Story line is very good too.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series

reviewText: I had this movie before on VHS and I am just replacing it.  The movie is slow to develop, but they are trying to cover 4 or 5 stories in this mini-series.  I love old war movies and just wanted it for my collection.  It is one movie that I will watch again, as I do enjoy watching this movie.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series

reviewText: I chose this rating because the actors were real.  I especially liked Robert and Wagner and Leslie Ann Warren.Angie Dickinson was great.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series

reviewText: I REALLY LOVED THE MOVIE A LOT. I REMEMBER SEEING THE MOVIE A LONG TIME AGO. I AM INTO HISTORICAL AND MILITARY MOVIES VERY MUCH.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series

reviewText: I enjoyed this movie with my husband & we both enjoy it a lot. I would  tell some military people to buy this move & my friends. I think very one should watch this movie.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series

reviewText: This was a movie I saw on TV a while ago & I want to own it. It was a made for TV movie that I wanted to own for some time. It is a great mini series.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series

reviewText: I loved this mini series when I saw it on TV, years ago. A lot of great movie stars and superb performances. A few story lines to follow, besides the bombing of Pearl Harbor. It will hold your interest.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series

reviewText: I had to watch part one and then skip to part three. Part two was nothing more than a blank screen.I had to twice smear Murhpy's clean and dust formula with Anti-static ingredient on the disc, Then I used a hair dryer and the heat from a 100 watt bulb to bake the oil into the disc. I then ran the disc twice back and forward through my DVD player.This treatment worked 100%. Sometimes it only works 80%.As for the story and the acting it was 5 star excellent, especially Angie Dickison, who was 6 star excellent.
summary: The story and acting was great but the disc failed.
Title: Pearl: Mini Series
